scripts.build:blocks-css: sass blocks/blocks-frontend.scss blocks/blocks-frontend.css && sass blocks/blocks-editor.scss blocks/blocks-editor.css
scripts.build:css: sass assets/scss/main.scss dist/assets/main.css && postcss dist/assets/main.css -o dist/assets/main.css
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:back-css && npm run build:blocks-css
